docs.summary: Integrate your payment services to allow merchants to use them on Wix sites.

params.name: credentials
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Merchant credentials for a PSP account.
The PSP specifies the keys for this object in the [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).
The merchant is prompted to enter these credentials when they connect their PSP account to their Wix site.

params.name: country
params.doc: Country where the merchant provides their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

params.name: currency
params.doc: Code for the merchant's preferred [currency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217).

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: wixMerchantId
params.doc: Wix merchant ID.

docs.summary:
This endpoint is used to connect a merchant's Payment Service Provider (PSP) account to a Wix site.

Wix calls this endpoint when a merchant chooses to connect a PSP in the Wix dashboard.
The PSP must verify the merchant's credentials and ensure that the merchant has an operational PSP account.
Learn more about [implementing this endpoint](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/connecting-accounts).

> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by a payment plugin and can have an arbitrary URL.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below, as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Responding to a failed connection attempt

params.name: wixTransactionId
params.doc: Wix transaction ID.

params.name: paymentMethod
params.doc:
Requested payment method.
If the value of this field is `creditCard`, the `paymentMethodData`
field's value includes credit card data in the value of the `card` field.
A PSP can specify the payment methods they accept in the [Wix Dev Ceter](https://dev.wix.com).

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

params.name: order
params.doc: Order information.

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: installments
params.doc: Number of payment installments requested.

params.name: wixMerchantId
params.doc: Wix merchant ID.

params.name: paymentMethodData
params.doc: Payment method data such as credit card information.

params.name: fraudInformation
params.doc: Fraud prevention data.

params.name: setupCredentialsOnFile
params.doc: Data about recurring payment setup.

params.name: offSession
params.doc:
Whether the request is for a recurring payment or merchant initiated transaction. If the value of this field is `true`, the PSP should use a payment method token to process the payment.
 Learn more about [recurring payments](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/sample-payment-flows#recurring-payments).

params.name: moto
params.doc: Whether the request is for a Mail Order/Telephone Order payment.

params.name: scaRequested
params.doc: Request transaction to be made using strong customer authentication e.g. 3-D Secure.

examples.title: Approving a payment instantly
Declining a payment instantly
Marking a payment as pending
Responding with a 3DS verification redirect
Approving a MOTO payment instantly
Approving a Google Pay payment with `PAN_ONLY` authentication
Approving a Google Pay payment with `CRYPTOGRAM_3DS` authentication

params.name: wixTransactionId
params.doc: Wix transaction ID.

params.name: wixRefundId
params.doc: Refund ID.

params.name: pluginTransactionId
params.doc: PSP transaction ID.

params.name: merchantCredentials
params.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

params.name: refundAmount
params.doc:
Total amount to refund in a currency’s smallest unit.

Learn more about [currency units](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/currencies).

params.name: mode
params.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

params.name: reason
params.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

docs.summary:
This endpoint is used to send a merchant's refund requests to a Payment Service Provider (PSP).

Wix calls this endpoint when a merchant initiates a refund from the Wix dashboard. Learn more about [implementing this endpoint](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/processing-refunds).
> You cannot try out this endpoint because it has to be implemented by a payment plugin and can have an arbitrary URL.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** and **POST** sections below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

params.name: event
params.doc: Event data.

docs.summary:
This Wix API is used by a Payment Service Provider (PSP) to send webhooks about payment and refund states to Wix.

> You cannot try out this endpoint because an `Authorization` header value has to be obtained
> with the OAuth 2.0 client credentials flow for a specific scope.
> So please ignore the **Authorization** section below as well as the **Try It Out** button.

examples.title: Refund failed (initiated by Wix)

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.

Merchant credentials for a PSP account.
The PSP specifies the keys for this object in the [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).
The merchant is prompted to enter these credentials when they connect their PSP account to their Wix site.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: credentials
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Merchant credentials for a PSP account.
The PSP specifies the keys for this object in the [Wix Developers Center](https://dev.wix.com/apps).
The merchant is prompted to enter these credentials when they connect their PSP account to their Wix site.

members.name: country
members.doc: Country where the merchant provides their services, in [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.

Merchant credentials that Wix will use when sending the merchant's payment and refund requests.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: credentials
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Merchant credentials that Wix will use when sending the merchant's payment and refund requests.

members.name: accountId
members.doc: Merchant account ID. The PSP must not change this value over the lifetime of the merchant's account.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Wix [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/reason-codes#account-connection-failure) indicating a type of failed request.

members.name: mode
members.doc: This field is ignored. Do not send it.

members.name: status
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

members.name: refundAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to refund in a currency’s smallest unit.

Learn more about [currency units](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/currencies).

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: reason
members.doc: Reason for refund. Defined by the merchant.

members.name: offSession
members.doc:
Whether the request is for setting up a recurring payment.  
 Learn more about [recurring payments](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/sample-payment-flows#recurring-payments).

members.name: expirationYear
members.doc: Full year of the card expiration date.

members.name: expirationMonth
members.doc: Month of the card expiration date.

members.name: pan
members.doc: Primary account number. The number of the payment card to charge.

members.name: cryptogram
members.doc: 3DS 2.0 challenge result. Included when the authentication method is `CRYPTOGRAM_3DS`.

members.name: eci
members.doc: Electronic Commerce Indicator. A number indicating the level of security used in the transaction.

members.name: accountVerified
members.doc: Whether the buyer's possession of the payment card was validated.

members.name: cardholderAuthenticated
members.doc: Whether the cardholder's identity was verified.

members.name: networkTransactionId
members.doc: Network payment ID. Only used for recurring payments.

members.name: dsTransactionId
members.doc: Directory transaction ID. Only used for off session payments.

members.name: issuerBank
members.doc: Bank for issuing the IDeal payment.

members.name: address
members.doc:
Address line.
This field represents a street and house number concatenation.

members.name: buyerId
members.doc: Unique buyer ID assigned by Wix.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Wix [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/reason-codes) indicating a failed or pending request.

members.name: redirectUrl
members.doc: URL where Wix can redirect the buyer to complete the payment.

members.name: status
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

members.name: credentialsOnFile
members.doc: Reference to a saved payment method.

members.name: token
members.doc: Token created locally by the PSP.

members.name: bin
members.doc: Issuer (business) identification number. First 6 or 8 digits of the card's number.

members.name: lastFour
members.doc: Last 4 digits of the card's number.

docs.summary:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: paymentMethod
members.doc:
Requested payment method.
If the value of this field is `creditCard`, the `paymentMethodData`
field's value includes credit card data in the value of the `card` field.
A PSP can specify the payment methods they accept in the [Wix Dev Ceter](https://dev.wix.com).

members.name: merchantCredentials
members.doc:
Set of key-value pairs.

Credentials that the PSP provided when the merchant connected their account.

members.name: mode
members.doc: Connection mode. Identifies whether a request is live or for testing purposes.

members.name: paymentMethodData
members.doc: Payment method data such as credit card information.

members.name: offSession
members.doc:
Whether the request is for a recurring payment or merchant initiated transaction. If the value of this field is `true`, the PSP should use a payment method token to process the payment.
 Learn more about [recurring payments](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/sample-payment-flows#recurring-payments).

members.name: moto
members.doc: Whether the request is for a Mail Order/Telephone Order payment.

members.name: scaRequested
members.doc: Request transaction to be made using strong customer authentication e.g. 3-D Secure.

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique order ID assigned by Wix.

members.name: returnUrls
members.doc:
Redirect URLs for different payment outcomes. PSP-hosted payment pages use these URLs to redirect
 the buyer back to the merchant’s site.

members.name: totalAmount
members.doc:
Total amount to pay in a currency’s smallest unit.
Includes all extra charges such as shipping and taxes.

Learn more about [currency units](https://dev.wix.com/docs/rest/api-reference/payment-provider-spi/currencies).

members.name: charges
members.doc: Additional charges applied to the order.

members.name: tax
members.doc: Tax amount applied to the order.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Discount amount applied to the order.

members.name: pluginId
members.doc: This field is ignored, do not send it.

members.name: resource
members.doc: Resource specifies event type based on its content.

members.name: wixRefundId
members.doc: Wix refund ID. This field is only required when a merchant initiates a refund from the Wix dashboard.

members.name: reasonCode
members.doc: Wix [reason code](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/provider-platform/reason-codes) indicating a failed or pending request.

members.name: credentialsOnFile
members.doc: Token data for stored payment method.

members.name: cardDetails
members.doc: Details of actual customer's card, obtained from a Funding PAN as opposed to a Device PAN.

members.name: bin
members.doc: Issuer (business) identification number. First 6 or 8 digits of the card's number.

members.name: lastFour
members.doc: Last 4 digits of the card's number.

members.name: token
members.doc: Payment method token created by the PSP.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • undefined
  • live
  • sandbox

Possible values are:
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • DUPLICATE
  • FRAUDULENT
  • REQUESTED_BY_CUSTOMER

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • ING
  • RABOBANK
  • ABN_AMRO
  • SNS_BANK
  • BUNQ
  • ASN_BANK
  • REGIOBANK
  • TRIODOS_BANK
  • KNAB
  • VAN_LANSCHOT
  • HANDELSBANKEN
  • REVOLUT

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • APPROVED
  • PENDING
  • CANCELED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN_AUTHENTICATION_METHOD
  • PAN_ONLY
  • CRYPTOGRAM_3DS

Possible values are:
  • undefined
  • physical
  • digital
